DOC.brief_summary: Barley , like oat , rich source soluble fibre β-glucan , show significantly low LDL-cholesterol ( LDL-C ) . However , barley food less widely study .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Fermented Barley Decrement Body Fat Obese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate whether supplementation barley β-glucan reduce visceral fat well serum low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) total cholesterol ( TC ) mildly hypercholesterolemic subject . In 12 week double-blind , control study , subject randomized one treatment group ( 3.0g/day β-glucan ) placebo group .
DOC.criteria: age 19 70 year , BMI ( Body Mass Index ) > 23 kg/m^2 , LDLC ( Low Density Lipoproteincholesterol ) concentration 110 250 mg/dL heart disease , liver kidney disease , food allergy , daily exercise habit , body weight increase decrease > 10 kg previous 3 month , irregular lifestyle habit take medication functional food know affect lipid metabolism .
